title: Space Science Fiction Music Pack Vol. 2
description: An other-worldly, colorful and dynamic, orchestral and synth oriented, music pack.
longDescription:
Listen to the demos!


Space Science Fiction Music Pack Vol. 2 is an other-worldly, colorful and dynamic, orchestral and synth oriented, music pack. It was inspired by Space Science Fiction RTS games. It was written with the intention of being the soundtrack behind epic strategy games, but it might be useful for other genres as well.


The music was written for synthesizers and orchestral instruments: including a string section, woodwind section, brass section, harp, choir, orchestral percussion and cinematic percussion. It varies in mood from soft and reflective to loud and epic.


It includes 10 tracks, with five additional edits per track, for a total of 60 music files.

The additional edits include a loop version, 2 bumpers that might be useful as transition or musical sfx, an ending edit and a short loop for short duration screens.

All the music files are .wav 44.1kHz, 16 bits.


Track list:


Comet Tail (03:41)

Event Horizon (03:39)

Galactic Center (04:12)

Gravitational Wave (04:14)

Gravity Pull (04:01)

March of Stars (04:24)

Ring Nebula (03:33)

Star Cluster (03:01)

Star Collapsing (03:33)

Stellar Dust (04:23)
